attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the foul,disgusting, repellent,polluting activity, known as 'Barbecue', banned from our shores forever!This abomination is an affront to civilised society, and an unregulated assault on my person, requiring National legislation- URGENTLY!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
